data.chText: 说明；说法；表白；表态
data.enText: something that you say or write that gives information or an opinion

data.chText: 下面的说法对不对？
data.enText: Are the following statements true or false?

data.chText: 你的表述可能引起误解。
data.enText: Your statement is misleading.

data.chText: 这是在表态呢，还是提出问题呢？
data.enText: Is that a statement or a question?

data.chText: 这出戏表明一种鲜明的政治立场。
data.enText: The play makes a strong political statement.

data.chText: 声明；陈述；报告
data.enText: a formal or official account of facts or opinions

data.chText: 正式 / 公开 / 书面 / 官方声明
data.enText: a formal/a public/a written/an official statement

data.chText: 政府发言人向新闻界发表了一份声明。
data.enText: A government spokesperson made a statement to the press.

data.chText: 人们预计首相将在今天下午就政策的改变发表声明。
data.enText: The prime minister is expected to issue a statement on the policy change this afternoon.

data.chText: 警方要求我写一份供述。
data.enText: The police asked me to make a statement (= a written account of facts concerning a crime, used in court if legal action follows) .

data.chText: 结算单；清单；报表
data.enText: a printed record of money paid, received, etc.

data.chText: 几位总监负责填写公司的财务报表。
data.enText: The directors are responsible for preparing the company's financial statements.

data.chText: 银行按月给我寄来结算单。
data.enText: My bank sends me monthly statements.

data.chText: 评估报告（英国地方教育主管部门针对儿童的特殊需要而提出意见）
data.enText: (in Britain) an official report on a child's special needs made by a local education authority

data.chText: 特殊教育需要评估报告
data.enText: a statement of special educational needs

data.chText: （文字）陈述，表述
data.enText: the act of stating or expressing sth in words

data.chText: 编写操作说明时，表述清晰明白至为重要。
data.enText: When writing instructions, clarity of statement is the most important thing.

data.chText: （英国）对儿童进行特殊教育评估认定
data.enText: (in Britain) to officially decide and report that a child has special needs for his or her education

data.chText: 评估认定须接受特殊教育的学童
data.enText: statemented children

data.text: bill ♦ statement ♦ account ♦ invoice ♦ tab ♦ check

data.chText: 以上各词均指账单、账目。
data.enText: These are all words for a record of how much you owe for goods or services you have bought or used.
bill

data.chText: 指账单：
data.enText: a list of goods that you have bought or services that you have used, showing how much you owe; the price or cost of sth

data.chText: 煤气费账单
data.enText: the gas bill
statement

data.chText: 指结算单、清单、报表：
data.enText: a printed record of money spent, received, etc.

data.chText: 公司的年度财务报表
data.enText: the company's annual financial statement

data.chText: 银行结单
data.enText: a bank statement (= a record of money paid into and out of a bank account)

data.chText: 信用卡结单
data.enText: a credit card statement
account

data.chText: 指赊销账、赊欠账、赊购：
data.enText: an arrangement with a shop/store or business to pay bills for goods or services at a later time, for example in regular amounts every month

data.chText: 请记在我的赊购账上。
data.enText: Put it on my account please.

data.chText: 在英国英语中，此义亦可用credit account；北美英语可用charge account。
data.enText: In British English this can also be called a credit account . In North American English it can be called a charge account .
invoice

data.chText: 指发票、发货或服务费用清单：
data.enText: ( rather formal ) a bill for goods that sb has bought or work that has been done for sb

data.chText: 营造商发出了一张250英镑的发票。
data.enText: The builders sent an invoice for £250.

data.chText: 用bill还是invoice？
bill指餐馆、酒吧、旅馆、煤气公司、电力公司等开出的账单或财产所有者开出的索赔清单。invoice指发票、发货费用清单或经客户与供应商约定的服务费用清单，一般于交货或完工后发出。
data.enText: You would get a bill in a restaurant, bar or hotel; from a company that supplies you with gas, electricity, etc.; or from sb whose property you have damaged. An invoice is for goods supplied or work done as agreed between a customer and supplier, and is usually sent after the goods have been delivered or the work finished.
bill or invoice?
tab

data.chText: 指待付的账单、账款、费用，尤指餐厅或酒吧账单：
data.enText: ( rather informal ) a bill for goods you receive but pay for later, especially for food or drinks in a restaurant or bar; the price or cost of sth

data.chText: 酒吧账单
data.enText: a bar tab

data.chText: 我可以记账吗？
data.enText: Can I put it on my tab?
check

data.chText: 指餐馆的账单：
data.enText: ( NAmE ) a piece of paper that shows how much you have to pay for the food and drinks that you have had in a restaurant

data.chText: 请把账单给我好吗？
data.enText: Can I have the check, please?

data.chText: 此义英国英语常用bill。
data.enText: In British English the usual word for this is bill .
the bill/invoice/tab/check for sth
to pay/settle a(n) bill/account/invoice/tab/check
to pick up (= pay) the bill/tab/check
to put sth on the/sb's bill/account/invoice/tab/check
to send/submit a(n) bill/invoice to a customer
to ask for/get the bill/check (= especially in a restaurant or bar)
She asked the waiter if she could have the bill/check.

data.text: statement ♦ comment ♦ announcement ♦ remark ♦ declaration ♦ observation

data.chText: 以上各词均指口头或书面的说明、宣布。
data.enText: These are all words for sth that you say or write, especially sth that gives information or an opinion.
statement

data.chText: 通常指正式的说明、声明、陈述、报告：
data.enText: something that you say or write that gives information or an opinion, often in a formal way

data.chText: 政府发言人向新闻界发表了一份声明。
data.enText: A government spokesperson made a statement to the press.
comment

data.chText: 指议论、评论、解释：
data.enText: something that you say or write that gives an opinion on sth or is a response to a question about a particular situation

data.chText: 她对我的工作提出了有益的意见。
data.enText: She made helpful comments on my work.
announcement

data.chText: 指公告、布告、通告：
data.enText: a spoken or written statement that informs people about sth

data.chText: 和平协议公告
data.enText: the announcement of a peace agreement
remark

data.chText: 指谈论、言论、评述：
data.enText: something that you say or write that gives an opinion or thought about sb/sth

data.chText: 对于这食物他作了许多无礼的评论。
data.enText: He made a number of rude remarks about the food.
declaration

data.chText: 指官方或正式的公告、宣告、宣言、声明：
data.enText: ( rather formal ) an official or formal statement, especially one that states an intention, belief or feeling, or that gives information

data.chText: 宣战
data.enText: the declaration of war
observation

data.chText: 尤指根据所见、所闻、所读而作的评论：
data.enText: ( rather formal ) a comment, especially one based on sth you have seen, heard or read

data.chText: 开头他先对这个报告作了几点概括性的评论。
data.enText: He began by making a few general observations about the report.

data.chText: 用comment、remark还是observation？
comment既可是官方的也可是个人的；remark既可是公开的也可是私下的，但总是非官方的，说话者可能未经深思熟虑；observation是非官方的，但通常较remark多几分考虑。
data.enText: A comment can be official or private. A remark can be made in public or private but is always unofficial and the speaker may not have considered it carefully. An observation is unofficial but is usually more considered than a remark.
comment, remark or observation?
to make a(n) statement/comment/announcement/remark/declaration/observation
to issue a(n) statement/comment/announcement/declaration
a(n) statement/comment/announcement/remark/declaration/observation about/on sth
an official statement/comment/announcement/declaration
a public statement/comment/announcement/remark/declaration
a private statement/comment/remark/observation

word_means: 对儿童进行特殊教育评估认定
simple_means.memory_skill: state 站，立 + ment 表名词 → 站着说话 → 声明立场

means: (英国)对儿童进行特殊教育评估认定

ex.zh: 对声明（或证词、表现）的回应
表示支持的声明（或证词、表现）
虚假/真实声明；虚假/真实证词

tr: a document showing credits and debits
(computer science) a line of code written as part of a computer program
a fact or assertion offered as evidence that something is true
example: it was a strong argument that his hypothesis was true

tr: a message that is stated or declared
a communication (oral or written) setting forth particulars or facts etc
example: according to his statement he was in London on that day
a Cadillac makes a statement about who you are
his tantrums are a statement of his need for attention

tr: (music) the presentation of a musical theme
example: the initial statement of the sonata

tr: the act of affirming or asserting or stating something

value.def: A statement is something that you say or write which gives information in a formal or definite way.

example.ex: Andrew now disowns that statement, saying he was depressed when he made it...
example.tran: 安德鲁现在推翻了那个说法，说那是自己在情绪低落时说的话。

example.ex: 'Things are moving ahead.'— I found that statement vague and unclear.
example.tran: “事情正在取得进展。”——我认为这个说法含糊不清。

value.tran: (正式或明确的口头或书面)陈述，声明

value.def: A statement is an official or formal announcement that is issued on a particular occasion.

example.ex: The statement by the military denied any involvement in last night's attack.
example.tran: 军方发表声明称其和昨晚的袭击无任何关系。

value.tran: (为某一场合特别发表的)官方声明，正式声明

value.def: You can refer to the official account of events which a suspect or a witness gives to the police as a statement .

example.ex: The 350-page report was based on statements from witnesses to the events.
example.tran: 这份 350 页的报告是根据各位证人对这些事件的证词写成的。

value.tran: (嫌疑人或证人向警方提供的)陈述，证词

value.def: If you describe an action or thing as a statement, you mean that it clearly expresses a particular opinion or idea that you have.

example.ex: The following recipe is a statement of another kind—food is fun!
example.tran: 下面的食谱是另一种观点的表现——食物可以带来乐趣！

value.def: A printed document showing how much money has been paid into and taken out of a bank or building society account is called a statement .

If a child is statemented, social services staff write a document stating that the child has special educational needs, and the local education authority has to make sure that everything that is necessary is provided for that child.

example.ex: Nearly a year later, it was agreed that Tom would be statemented...
example.tran: 近一年后，汤姆被批准将获得特殊教育。

example.ex: I had eight statemented children in my  class.
example.tran: 我的班里有 8 名需要接受特殊教育的孩子。

value.tran: 证明(儿童)有特殊教育需求

trans: 损益计算书；损益表，利润表
银行对账单；银行结单(某时期内存户存取款项的清单)
(公司或组织的)宗旨说明，任务说明
现金流量表；现金流转表

partsOfSpeech.dec: apo 离开 + stas〔= stat〕站，立 + y 表行为 → 站远 → 脱党
apo 离开，远离 + stat 站，立 + e → 站得远 → 叛教者
circum 周围 + stan 站，立 + ce → 站在周围的东西 → 环境
con 加强 + stant 站，立 → 一直站着 → 不变的
con 加强 + stan 站，立 + cy 表状态 → 不变
di〔s〕分开 + stant 站，立 → 分开站 → 有距离的
equi 平等 + distance 距离 → 等距离
e 加强 + stat 站，立 + e → 立住不动〔但有价值的东西〕→〔房子等〕不动产
home 家 + stead → 建立起成片的屋子 → 家园
in 向内；进入 + stant 站，立 → 站进来 → 紧急的
instant 紧急的 + aneous 有…特征的 → 马上发生的 → 即时的
ob 逆 + st 站，立 + acle 表物 → 反着站的东西 → 障碍〔物〕
obstinate的名词
ob 逆 + stin 站，立 + ate 具有…的，有…性质的 →〔和别人〕反着站 → 顽固的
st 站，立 + ability 易…性，stable的名词 → 稳定性
st 站，立 + able …的 → 能站住的 → 稳定的
stable的动词
state 站，立 + ment 表名词 → 站着说话 → 声明立场
stat 站，立 + ic …的 → 立着不动的 → 静止的
sta 站，立 + tion 表名词 → 站立的地方 → 位置
sta 站，立 + tion 行为 + ary …的 → 站着的 → 不动的
sta 站，立 + tion 行为 + ery 表名词 → 文具
stat 站，立 + ue → 站着的〔雕像〕→ 雕像
stat 站，立 + ure 表状态 → 站直的状态 → 身材
stat 站，立 + us 表名词，用于科学术语 → 状态；情况
stat 站，立 + ute → 设立后不动的东西 → 法令
fast 稳固的 → 坚定的；固定的
sub 下 + stan 站，立 + ce → 立在下面的东西 → 本质
sub 下 + stant 站，立 + ial …的 → 本质的；实在的
sub 下 + stant 站，立 + iate 使… →〔让理论〕能站得住脚 → 证实
sub 下 + stant 站，立 + ive …的 → 根本的；实质的
with 相反 + stand 站 → 站在和别人相反的位置 → 抵抗
advertise 做广告 + ment 行为或结果 → 广告
agree 同意 + ment 行为或结果 → 协议
allure 诱惑 + ment 行为或结果 → 诱惑物
amuse 使愉快 + ment 行为或结果 → 娱乐，消遣
develop 发展 + ment 行为或结果 → 发展
enact 颁布 + ment 行为或结果 → （法令）颁布
establish 建立 + ment 行为或结果 → 建立
frag 破碎，打碎 + ment 行为或结果 → 碎片
harass 骚扰 + ment 行为或结果 → 烦恼；骚扰
manage 管理 + ment 行为或结果 → 管理
move 动 + ment 行为或结果 → 运动
state 声明 + ment 行为或结果 → 声明
base 基础 + ment 具体物，组织或机构 → 地下室
embank 筑堤 + ment 具体物，组织或机构 → 堤岸；路堤
equip 配备，装备 + ment 具体物，组织或机构 → 设备
govern 统治；管理 + ment 具体物，组织或机构 → 政府；管理
nutri 滋养 + ment 具体物，组织或机构 → 营养品
pave 铺路 + ment 具体物，组织或机构 → 人行道
seg 切，割 + ment 具体物，组织或机构 → 部分，一段
